source:
amp-img

amp-video

background-audio

amp-gfycat

amp-google-vrview-image

sections.doc_:
## Introduction

Stories support only a [subset of the media types](/content/amp-dev/documentation/components/reference/amp-story.md#children-of-amp-story-grid-layer) available in AMPHTML. This samples gives an overview on which are supported.
sections.cachedMarkedDoc:
Introduction

Stories support only a subset of the media types available in AMPHTML. This samples gives an overview on which are supported.
sections.normalizedDoc_:
## Introduction

Stories support only a [subset of the media types](/content/amp-dev/documentation/components/reference/amp-story.md#children-of-amp-story-grid-layer) available in AMPHTML. This samples gives an overview on which are supported.

sections.code:
<!doctype html>
<html amp
  lang="en">
<head>
    <meta charset="utf-8">
    <script async src="https://cdn.ampproject.org/v0.js"></script>
    <script async custom-element="amp-story"
        src="https://cdn.ampproject.org/v0/amp-story-1.0.js"></script>
    <title>Supported media types in AMP Stories</title>
    <meta name="description" content="Get started with amp-story">
    <script async custom-element="amp-audio" src="https://cdn.ampproject.org/v0/amp-audio-0.1.js"></script>
    <script async custom-element="amp-gfycat" src="https://cdn.ampproject.org/v0/amp-gfycat-0.1.js"></script>
    <script async custom-element="amp-google-vrview-image" src="https://cdn.ampproject.org/v0/amp-google-vrview-image-0.1.js"></script>
    <script async custom-element="amp-video" src="https://cdn.ampproject.org/v0/amp-video-0.1.js"></script>
    <meta name="viewport"
          content="width=device-width,minimum-scale=1,initial-scale=1">
    <link rel="canonical" href="http://localhost:8080/documentation/examples/multimedia-animations/supported_media_types_in_amp_stories/index.html">
    <style amp-boilerplate>body{-webkit-animation:-amp-start 8s steps(1,end) 0s 1 normal both;-moz-animation:-amp-start 8s steps(1,end) 0s 1 normal both;-ms-animation:-amp-start 8s steps(1,end) 0s 1 normal both;animation:-amp-start 8s steps(1,end) 0s 1 normal both}@-webkit-keyframes -amp-start{from{visibility:hidden}to{visibility:visible}}@-moz-keyframes -amp-start{from{visibility:hidden}to{visibility:visible}}@-ms-keyframes -amp-start{from{visibility:hidden}to{visibility:visible}}@-o-keyframes -amp-start{from{visibility:hidden}to{visibility:visible}}@keyframes -amp-start{from{visibility:hidden}to{visibility:visible}}</style><noscript><style amp-boilerplate>body{-webkit-animation:none;-moz-animation:none;-ms-animation:none;animation:none}</style></noscript>
    <style amp-custom>
      body {
        font-family: 'Roboto', sans-serif;
      }
      amp-story-page h1 {
        background: white;
        padding: 8px 16px;
        border-radius: 8px;
      }
      amp-story-page {
        background: white;
      }
      amp-story-grid-layer {
        align-items: center;
        justify-items: center;
      }
    </style>
  </head>

<body>
  <amp-story standalone
    title="Stories in AMP - Media"
    publisher="AMP Project"
    publisher-logo-src="http://localhost:8080/favicons/coast-228x228.png"
    poster-portrait-src="https://picsum.photos/300/400"
    poster-square-src="https://picsum.photos/300/300"
    poster-landscape-src="https://picsum.photos/400/300">
sections.preview:
<amp-story standalone
    title="Stories in AMP - Media"
    publisher="AMP Project"
    publisher-logo-src="http://localhost:8080/favicons/coast-228x228.png"
    poster-portrait-src="https://picsum.photos/300/400"
    poster-square-src="https://picsum.photos/300/300"
    poster-landscape-src="https://picsum.photos/400/300">

sections.doc_: Images are fully supported via the `amp-img` extension.
sections.code: amp-img
sections.preview: amp-img
sections.normalizedDoc_: Images are fully supported via the `amp-img` extension.

sections.doc_: The only way to embed videos is currently via the [amp-video](/content/amp-dev/documentation/components/reference/amp-video-v0.1.md) extension.
sections.code: amp-video
sections.preview: amp-video
sections.normalizedDoc_: The only way to embed videos is currently via the [amp-video](/content/amp-dev/documentation/components/reference/amp-video-v0.1.md) extension.

sections.doc_: Note that `amp-video` extension has different validation rules when used within an AMP Story—both the `autoplay` and `poster` attributes are required.
sections.normalizedDoc_: Note that `amp-video` extension has different validation rules when used within an AMP Story—both the `autoplay` and `poster` attributes are required.

sections.doc_: You can playback audio for a single `amp-story-page` using the [`background-audio`](/content/amp-dev/documentation/components/reference/amp-story.html#background-audio-[optional]_1) attribute on the `amp-story-page` element. This attribute can also be applied to the `amp-story` element to playback audio across an [`amp-story`](/content/amp-dev/documentation/components/reference/amp-story.html#background-audio-[optional]).
sections.normalizedDoc_: You can playback audio for a single `amp-story-page` using the [`background-audio`](/content/amp-dev/documentation/components/reference/amp-story.html#background-audio-[optional]_1) attribute on the `amp-story-page` element. This attribute can also be applied to the `amp-story` element to playback audio across an [`amp-story`](/content/amp-dev/documentation/components/reference/amp-story.html#background-audio-[optional]).

sections.code: amp-gfycat
sections.preview: amp-gfycat

sections.doc_:
Stories will support 360° Media, consisting of 360° videos and images, soon.

Note: The [amp-google-vrview-image](/content/amp-dev/documentation/components/reference/amp-google-vrview-image-vundefined.md) component is currently experimental. To experience this sample please enable the needed [experiments](/documentation/guides-and-tutorials/learn/experimental.html).
sections.code: amp-google-vrview-image
sections.preview: amp-google-vrview-image
sections.normalizedDoc_:
Stories will support 360° Media, consisting of 360° videos and images, soon.

 Note: The [amp-google-vrview-image](/content/amp-dev/documentation/components/reference/amp-google-vrview-image-vundefined.md) component is currently experimental. To experience this sample please enable the needed [experiments](/documentation/guides-and-tutorials/learn/experimental.html).

document.head:
<meta charset="utf-8">
    <script async src="https://cdn.ampproject.org/v0.js"></script>
    
    <title>Supported media types in AMP Stories</title>
    <meta name="description" content="Get started with amp-story">
    <script async custom-element="amp-audio" src="https://cdn.ampproject.org/v0/amp-audio-0.1.js"></script>
    <script async custom-element="amp-gfycat" src="https://cdn.ampproject.org/v0/amp-gfycat-0.1.js"></script>
    <script async custom-element="amp-google-vrview-image" src="https://cdn.ampproject.org/v0/amp-google-vrview-image-0.1.js"></script>
    <script async custom-element="amp-video" src="https://cdn.ampproject.org/v0/amp-video-0.1.js"></script>
    <meta name="viewport"
          content="width=device-width,minimum-scale=1,initial-scale=1">
    <link rel="canonical" href="http://localhost:8080/documentation/examples/multimedia-animations/supported_media_types_in_amp_stories/index.html">
    <style amp-boilerplate>body{-webkit-animation:-amp-start 8s steps(1,end) 0s 1 normal both;-moz-animation:-amp-start 8s steps(1,end) 0s 1 normal both;-ms-animation:-amp-start 8s steps(1,end) 0s 1 normal both;animation:-amp-start 8s steps(1,end) 0s 1 normal both}@-webkit-keyframes -amp-start{from{visibility:hidden}to{visibility:visible}}@-moz-keyframes -amp-start{from{visibility:hidden}to{visibility:visible}}@-ms-keyframes -amp-start{from{visibility:hidden}to{visibility:visible}}@-o-keyframes -amp-start{from{visibility:hidden}to{visibility:visible}}@keyframes -amp-start{from{visibility:hidden}to{visibility:visible}}</style><noscript><style amp-boilerplate>body{-webkit-animation:none;-moz-animation:none;-ms-animation:none;animation:none}</style></noscript>
document.title: Supported media types in AMP Stories
document._description: Stories support only a subset of the media types available in AMPHTML.
